title: PM felicitates COAS on conferment of Order of Union by UAE President
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 17 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday congratulated the Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa on the conferment of the Order of the Union by President of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al-Nahyan.
The Prime Minister in a tweet posted on his social media account said it was an honour for General Qamar Javed Bajwa as well as for Pakistan.
He further said that the relationship between the two brotherly countries of Pakistan and UAE have gone from strength to strength.
